sentence.Network_en: Guess we caught another one, right? All for one and one for all?

sentence.Network_en: I usually go for about one and one half inches.
sentence.Network_cn: 我通常到约一个半英寸.

sentence.Network_en: Ms. Cosby provided the one - and - one - half - million - dollar yearly budget for the project.
sentence.Network_cn: 考斯比 女士为这个工程提供了每年150万美元的预算.
